examples.example: 我会努力追求梦想，相信我能取得成功，并且我的朋友们也会同样如此。

translate.english: I will strive to pursue my dream, believe that I can succeed, and the same is true for my friends.

examples.example: 我的同学们都很努力学习，我也会同样如此，争取取得更好的成绩。

translate.english: My classmates all study very hard, and I will do the same to strive for better grades.

examples.example: 他在工作中取得了很大的成就，我也希望自己能同样如此。

translate.english: He has made great achievements in his work, and I also hope I can do the same.
